entry.title: Build Personal Website with Hexo and GitHub Pages on Mac
entry.content:
A challenge, no doubt.

In this post:

  • A brief overview of how to build a personal blog

  • Offical documentation links for reference

Intro

It has been long time since I want to have a particular space to record my life, and until now I’ve finally started creating my personal website here.

As the first post, I am writing this article just in case anyone who is also interested in owning a personal website but haven’t been prepared yet. On the other hand, it will be an importent reference for myself to re-create the environment efficiently when I change the Mac or migrate data in the future.
